tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_recognition (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    reward_name TEXT,
    reward_description TEXT,
    date_given DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_rewards (
  reward_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id UUID,
  reward_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  reward_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES organization(organization_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reward (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    type VARCHAR(20),
    employee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Recognition (
    recognition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    employee_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES Reward(reward_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recognition (
  recognition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reward_id INT,
  recognition_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards(reward_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Recognition (
    recognition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID NOT NULL,
    receiver_id UUID NOT NULL,
    message TEXT,
    recognition_date TIMESTAMP
);
